twc_daily.narrative: Partly cloudy. Lows overnight in the upper 70s.
Showers and thunderstorms late. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.
Afternoon showers and thunderstorms. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Scattered thunderstorms. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the low 70s.
A few thunderstorms possible. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the low 70s.

nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 105. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 77. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny. High near 94, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 106. Southwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
